Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Brin Mclaughlin
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera while on vacation. (My previous one died under mysterious circumstances and will be autopsied upon arriving home.) For now, while I am still away, I needed a basic camera that would use my existing Olympus camera accessories (xD cards, AA batteries, USB cable) and the FE-45 seems to fit the bill. At just a little over a hundred dollars, it's a nice bargain. The manual is a little less intuitive than I would have liked, but if you have already owned other Olympus digital cameras, then this won't be a surprise. Overall, so far, it's been a nice camera to use.

Reviews.Title: Camera Didn't Work
Reviews.Author: B. Stricker
Reviews.Content: I don't know if we received a refurbished camera (even though it was advertised as new) but this camera did not function from day one.  No matter how often we replaced the battery it said it was empty - the camera would turn off in the middle of taking a photo.  The couple of photos we did manage to take were horrible quality.  Not a good product.  On the upside - the seller was great about letting us return it for a full refund.  But buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: lousy - disappointed with Olympus
Reviews.Author: prudd802
Reviews.Content: I have an Olympus and love it, bought this for my daughter.  It was awful.  She had to return it twice.  The pictures weren't good.  Finally she just trashed it and bought a different brand.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Just okay
Reviews.Author: DAVID WINTHROP
Reviews.Content: Just an adequate point and shoot camera. Has trouble acknowledging the disposition of the battery charge. Sometimes I have to open and close the battery door to make the camera recognize the batteries.

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE-45
Reviews.Author: L. Shaw "L. Shaw"
Reviews.Content: My husband and I love this camera; we take it everywhere.  It takes very good photos.  We are very pleased with the quality for such a affordable price.Olympus FE-45 10MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.5-inch LCD (Titanium)
